verses.text: Happy are those who consider \w the|strong="H1732"\w* weak; \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* day \w of|strong="H4210"\w* misfortune \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \nd Lord\nd* will deliver them.

\w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* keep \w them|strong="H3117"\w* safe, happy, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H7451"\w* \w give|strong="H7919"\w* \w them|strong="H3117"\w* up \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* rage \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* foes.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sustain \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* bed \w of|strong="H3068"\w* languishing; tending \w their|strong="H3068"\w* sickness, \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w long|strong="H5315"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w lie|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* cause \w I|strong="H5921"\w* say, ‘\nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, show \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* favour; \w heal|strong="H2015"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* sinned \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.’

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* enemies speak \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* nothing \w but|strong="H3588"\w* evil, ‘\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* die, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* name pass away?’

\w When|strong="H4970"\w* \w one|strong="H8034"\w* comes \w to|strong="H4191"\w* see \w me|strong="H4191"\w*, \w their|strong="H4191"\w* words ring hollow; \w their|strong="H4191"\w* heart keeps gathering \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* while; \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w when|strong="H4970"\w* \w they|strong="H7451"\w* go \w out|strong="H7451"\w*, \w they|strong="H7451"\w* give \w it|strong="H8034"\w* speech.

\w In|strong="H1696"\w* secret \w they|strong="H2351"\w* whisper \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w those|strong="H3318"\w* \w who|strong="H7723"\w* hate \w me|strong="H7200"\w* plot evil \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*.

‘\w Some|strong="H3605"\w* fatal disease \w has|strong="H3605"\w* fastened \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*; \w and|strong="H7451"\w* \w now|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* lies, \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H7451"\w* rise \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w more|strong="H5921"\w*.’

\w My|strong="H6965"\w* most trusted friend, \w on|strong="H6965"\w* whom \w I|strong="H1697"\w* relied, \w who|strong="H3808"\w* ate \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H6965"\w* bread, \w has|strong="H1697"\w* turned \w against|strong="H6965"\w* \w me|strong="H3254"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1571"\w* do \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*, graciously raise \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H1431"\w*, \w that|strong="H3899"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H1571"\w* pay \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w due|strong="H5921"\w* reward.

\w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6965"\w* know \w you|strong="H6965"\w* delight \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w*: \w if|strong="H2603"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* foes \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6965"\w* shout \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* triumph.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* innocence \w you|strong="H3588"\w* uphold \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* set \w me|strong="H5921"\w* forever \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* face.
\em Blessed be the \+nd Lord\+nd*, the God of Israel,\em* \em from everlasting to everlasting,\em* \em Amen and Amen.\em*
